class_notes: This section is for traditional BSN semester 3 students only. This course contains a clinical component. Clinical may scheduled any day not in lecture, including weekends for 12 hours.
course_description: This course provides clinical practicum for the theory courses: Maternity & Reproductive Health. Students will extend critical thinking and clinical judgment to meet the physical, psychosocial, cultural and spiritual needs of clients and families in the clinical areas.
